docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs # For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands # mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout # mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.text: Desarrollo # WEB Site (bandera) # Martes 19 de abril se cambio el tamaño del slider a W1920 H1200 en el ambiente de desarrollo Estamos a la espera de la evalucacion de los cambios que hizo la semana pasada.

docs.text:
Tareas en curso # WEB Site (bandera) # [ ] Mòdulo columnistas que muestre solo tres [ ] Buscador de fechas [ ] "Ùltimas noticias" solo mostra ultimos 3 [ ] Albùm de fotografia que sea automàtico [ ] Jupiter [ ] Saturn [ ] Uranus [ ] Neptune [ ] Comet Haley def fn(): pass [x] Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit [ ] Vestibulum convallis sit amet nisi a tincidunt [x] In hac habitasse platea dictumst [x] In scelerisque nibh non dolor mollis congue sed et metus [ ] Praesent sed risus massa [ ] Aenean pretium efficitur erat, donec pharetra, ligula non scelerisque First Header Second Header Third Header Content Cell Content Cell Content Cell Content Cell Content Cell Content Cell Fenced code blocks are like Standard Markdown’s regular code blocks, except that they’re not indented and instead rely on start and end fence lines to delimit the code block. Diagrama Graph LR # graph LR A[Inicio del proceso] -- Enlace texto --> B((Codificacion)) A --> C(Round Rect) B --> D{Evalua} C --> D D -- si aplica --> P[Square Rect] D -- no aplica --> E[Square Rect] Ejemplo # flowchart TD A[Inicio] --> B{Es así?} B -- SI --> C[OK] C --> D[Repensar] D --> B B -- No ----> E[Fin] Diagrama secuencial # sequenceDiagram participant Elvis participant Alex Elvis->>Jose: Hola Jose, como estas? loop Visita Medica Jose->>Jose: Sobreviviendo el coronavirus end Note right of Jose: Actitud racional
prevalece! Jose-->>Elvis: Que bien! Jose->>Alex: Como estas tu? Alex-->>Jose: Muy bien! Ejemplo # sequenceDiagram participant web as Navegador Web participant blog as Servicio de Blog participant account as Servicio de Contabilidad participant mail as Servicio de correo participant db as Almacenamiento Note over web,db: The user must be logged in to submit blog posts web->>+account: Logs in using credentials account->>db: Query stored accounts db->>account: Respond with query result alt Credentials not found account->>web: Invalid credentials else Credentials found account->>-web: Successfully logged in Note over web,db: When the user is authenticated, they can now submit new posts web->>+blog: Submit new post blog->>db: Store post data par Notifications blog--)mail: Send mail to blog subscribers blog--)db: Store in-site notifications and Response blog-->>-web: Successfully posted end end Diagrama er # erDiagram Cliente ||--o{ Pedido : places Pedido ||--|{ Articulos : contains Cliente }|..|{ Direccion-entrega : uses Ejemplo 1 # erDiagram CUSTOMER }|..|{ DELIVERY-ADDRESS : has CUSTOMER ||--o{ ORDER : places CUSTOMER ||--o{ INVOICE : "liable for" DELIVERY-ADDRESS ||--o{ ORDER : receives INVOICE ||--|{ ORDER : covers ORDER ||--|{ ORDER-ITEM : includes PRODUCT-CATEGORY ||--|{ PRODUCT : contains PRODUCT ||--o{ ORDER-ITEM : "ordered in" Ejemplo 2 # erDiagram CAR ||--o{ NAMED-DRIVER : allows CAR { string allowedDriver FK "The license of the allowed driver" string registrationNumber string make string model } PERSON ||--o{ NAMED-DRIVER : is PERSON { string driversLicense PK "The license #" string firstName string lastName int age } Diagrama "journey" # journey title Día de trabajo section Viaje al trabajo Preparar el café: 5: José Actualizar las Workstations: 3: José Hacer el trabajo: 1: José, María section Regreso a casa Camino a casa: 3: José Dormir: 5: José Diagrama de clases # classDiagram Class01 <|-- UnaClassMuyLarga : Cool Class03 *-- Class04 Class05 o-- Class06 Class07 .. Class08 Class09 --> C2 : Dónde estoy? Class09 --* C3 Class09 --|> Class07 Class07 : equals() Class07 : Object[] elementData Class01 : size() Class01 : int mono Class01 : int goríla Class08 <--> C2: Rótulo interesante Diagrama de GANTT insertado a mermaid # gantt dateFormat DD-MM-YYYY title Diagrama de GANTT insertado a mermaid excludes weekdays 10-01-2014 section Increíble Proyecto Completed tarea :done, des1, 05-01-2014,08-01-2014 Active tarea :active, des2, 09-01-2014, 3d Future tarea : des3, after des2, 5d Future tarea2 : des4, after des3, 5d Diagrama GIT (experimental) # gitGraph: options { "nodeSpacing": 150, "nodeRadius": 10 } end commit branch newbranch checkout newbranch commit commit checkout master commit commit merge newbranch

docs.text: graph LR A[Inicio del proceso] -- Enlace texto --> B((Codificacion)) A --> C(Round Rect) B --> D{Evalua} C --> D D -- si aplica --> P[Square Rect] D -- no aplica --> E[Square Rect]

docs.text: flowchart TD A[Inicio] --> B{Es así?} B -- SI --> C[OK] C --> D[Repensar] D --> B B -- No ----> E[Fin]
docs.title: Ejemplo

docs.text:
sequenceDiagram participant Elvis participant Alex Elvis->>Jose: Hola Jose, como estas? loop Visita Medica Jose->>Jose: Sobreviviendo el coronavirus end Note right of Jose: Actitud racional
prevalece! Jose-->>Elvis: Que bien! Jose->>Alex: Como estas tu? Alex-->>Jose: Muy bien!
docs.title: Diagrama secuencial

docs.text: sequenceDiagram participant web as Navegador Web participant blog as Servicio de Blog participant account as Servicio de Contabilidad participant mail as Servicio de correo participant db as Almacenamiento Note over web,db: The user must be logged in to submit blog posts web->>+account: Logs in using credentials account->>db: Query stored accounts db->>account: Respond with query result alt Credentials not found account->>web: Invalid credentials else Credentials found account->>-web: Successfully logged in Note over web,db: When the user is authenticated, they can now submit new posts web->>+blog: Submit new post blog->>db: Store post data par Notifications blog--)mail: Send mail to blog subscribers blog--)db: Store in-site notifications and Response blog-->>-web: Successfully posted end end
docs.title: Ejemplo

docs.text: erDiagram Cliente ||--o{ Pedido : places Pedido ||--|{ Articulos : contains Cliente }|..|{ Direccion-entrega : uses
docs.title: Diagrama er

docs.text: erDiagram CUSTOMER }|..|{ DELIVERY-ADDRESS : has CUSTOMER ||--o{ ORDER : places CUSTOMER ||--o{ INVOICE : "liable for" DELIVERY-ADDRESS ||--o{ ORDER : receives INVOICE ||--|{ ORDER : covers ORDER ||--|{ ORDER-ITEM : includes PRODUCT-CATEGORY ||--|{ PRODUCT : contains PRODUCT ||--o{ ORDER-ITEM : "ordered in"
docs.title: Ejemplo 1

docs.text: erDiagram CAR ||--o{ NAMED-DRIVER : allows CAR { string allowedDriver FK "The license of the allowed driver" string registrationNumber string make string model } PERSON ||--o{ NAMED-DRIVER : is PERSON { string driversLicense PK "The license #" string firstName string lastName int age }
